## Checklist (Required)
- [ ] I created/updated a `WRK-...` entry in `docs/tracking/WORK_ITEMS.md` before implementation.
- [ ] I added a `CHG-...` entry in `docs/tracking/CHANGE_LOG.md`.
- [ ] I added/updated `BUG-...` in `docs/tracking/BUG_REGISTER.md` for bug work.
- [ ] I added `TST-...` evidence in `docs/tracking/TEST_EVIDENCE.md`.
- [ ] I added `DEC-...` in `docs/tracking/DECISION_LOG.md` when needed.
- [ ] I documented why the change was made, not only what changed.
